name: ANNIE X MUSIC
description: ANNIE X MUSIC is a Telegram Music Player Bot built using Python, leveraging Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls for seamless music streaming.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Token from BotFather after creating your bot on Telegram.

OWNER_ID.description: Your Telegram numeric user ID (use @userinfobot to get it).

STRING_SESSION.description: Pyrogram v2 session string from @Strings_Gen_Robot on Telegram.

LOGGER_ID.description: Chat ID of your log group. Add your bot there and make it admin.

COOKIE_URL.description: Batbin or Pastebin raw URL containing your YouTube cookies file.

API_KEY.description: API key for custom music download server (used with API_URL).

DEEP_API.description: DeepAI API key from https://deepai.org/ for AI features (optional).

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: API key of your Heroku account (used for update deployment).

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The name of your Heroku app (used with HEROKU_API_KEY).
